data.name: Boney's Research On Humans!
data.detailed_description:
Story

Monsternett year 20XX – Boney is out to find some clues about the mysterious creatures called humans while sneaking around in a secret lab he ends up transporting himself to the human world and now he has to return to Monsternett whilst gathering as much info as he can.

Gameplay
Boney's research on humans is a 2d top down stealth game where your objective is to use your surroundings to sneak around, you can hide under tables in lab containers, trees you name it you might even find a card box to sneak around in, and find the exit to the level.

  • Each level will contain different enemies which you'll be able to research using your trusty camera and fill up the notes to take back to the monster world.

  • Find out about the monsters and humans with secret collectables throughout the levels which contain details about the history and secrets of their worlds.

  • At the end of each level you'll be scored with your sneakiness and data gathering skills so try to get the best score!

Characters

Boney is an aspiring journalist following the steps of the great Skullman who was a war journalist back in the dark ages, he is trying to make a name for himself by uncovering the secrets behind the creatures called humans.
One day he got sucked into a portal while gathering evidence, he’s trying his best to go back to Monsternett taking as much information as he can on his way back.

data.short_description: Boney is an aspiring journalist looking for the next big scoop when he gets a tip about a secret lab operation he ends up going to the biggest scoop of his undead life! Now he has to return to Monsternett and share his findings with the undead world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

release_date.date: When The Dead Roam The Earth
